title: Scenic Valley Views, Nine-foot Ceilings, On-Site Maintenance
map_address: 6170 Terrace View Lane near Terrace View Drive
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 741 Sq.
Live better at Belara at Lakeland.
Located in Lakeland Hills Auburn, Washington.
Bordered by pristine, wooded greenbelt and overlooking the Auburn Valley providing breath taking views...there is no other place to call home!

Each home here at Belara features 9 foot ceilings, striking granite counter tops in large open kitchens that were made for entertaining, maple or cherry finish cabinetry, a gorgeous fireplace in each living room.
Not to mention all your basic necessities- washer/dryer, dishwasher, over the stove microwave, additional storage, and built in computer desk.

Work out in the membership worthy fitness room available to you 24 hours a day 7 days a week, shoot hoops in the indoor sports court, relax by the infinity pool or take a dip in the hot tub, you can even spend the day watching movies or TV in the entertainment room.
Belara is in the center of it all!
You will be just a short drive away from shopping and entertainment, either it being local or taking a joy ride 30 minutes North to Seattle.
Minutes away from Highway 167, Highway 18 and Interstate 5 providing easy access to all major Metropolitan areas.
At Belara, you are surrounded by life's many pleasures!
We are currently only offering 3 to 12 month Leases.
- Rentable Items: Carport $50 Garage $150 Tandem $175 (2 vehicles with 2 leaseholders are eligible to rent this garage)
- Surrounded by Schools, Shops, Restaurants and Parks
*Please note that each apartment may have one vehicle.
If a second vehicle parking spot is needed one of the above must be purchased.
2 Pets Max Restrictions & Fee's may apply.
Residents must make 2.5 times the rental amount.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
